physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#437, L Rear Rabbi C.E.H. Kauvar, 4th Annual USO - JWB Rocky Mountain Area, Armed Service Conference, BMH (1580 Gaylord).''

mods.abstract: U.S.O. - Jewish Welfare Board Rocky Mountain Area conference award ceremony. Rabbi C. E. Kauvar stands at left behind a speakers podium handing a Distinguished Service Award to an unidentified man. Two more men wearing United States Army uniforms sit in front of them at a head table.

name.namePart: Kauvar, C. E. Hillel--(Charles Eliezer Hillel),--1879-1971
